nodes.text: Tallov Kersk's wife joined him in establishing a farm on the planet Muzara—in 4000 BBY. The Kersks were joined by their son, Vettle, Tallov's brother-in-law Karn, his wife, and their daughter, Cavvie. The Kersk family became the first settlers from the Brentaal League to encounter the planet's native species, the Muza.
